name: Fill Multicolor
description:
Sometimes the smallest ideas are the most thoughtful. Fill Multicolor has a very simple premise, you are presented with a grid of dots and you must connect all the dots. Sounds easy? But wait! There are two-color dots that require certain rules in order to be connected. Dots cannot be connected twice. You must connect all the dots(Obviously). All this combines to make an addictive puzzle game that brightens your brain.
 

Levels with gradually increasing difficulty
Solve over 1,250+ levels. You can play this addictive puzzle game in various difficulty packs. Each level pack has multiple levels with an increasing challenge. Want the real challenge? Boost your brain by playing the ultimate difficult levels.
 

RELAXING DOTS LINE PUZZLE:

Sharpen your mind with a connect-the-block-style one-line brain training puzzle game. Fill Multicolor is a fun, simple, and beautiful relaxing puzzle game with an immersive atmosphere.
 

FUN BRAIN TRAINING:

Play our puzzle dot game for free and notice how your brain becomes more active the more you play. If you think you are an intelligent person, you are in the right place. The more you play and solve the dot connect puzzle challenges, the more intelligent you become.

FEATURES:

● Minimalist design: beautiful colors, awesome sound effects.

● Smart level design: more than 1250 handcrafted smart levels.

● 22 Awesome dots design.
